documentation.title: If-else Declarations
documentation.standard: The `else` and `elseif` keywords should be on a new line.

code.title: Invalid: `elseif` on the same line as the closing curly of the preceding (else)if.

documentation.standard: The indentation for the `else` and `elseif` keywords should be the same as the indentation for the preceding (else)if.

code.title: Invalid: Indentation of the else not aligned with the preceding if.
